title: Workshop on Self-Assessment Design for Developing Lifelong Learning Measurement Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Instructional Design Concepts and Experience in Assessment Tool Development
context.additional_context: A course where practicing elementary language educators design lifelong learning competency diagnostic systems by developing self-assessment tools.

learning_goals: Learners can explain four core components of lifelong learning measurement tools (based on 18-item standards)
Learners can draft 10 preliminary items applying question design principles (validity/reliability verification procedures) for self-assessment tool development
Learners can propose improvements to measurement tools incorporating peer evaluation and feedback using online collaboration tools (Google Docs)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
